name: a brass lantern
desc: It's currently off, but full of flammable kerosene. Kind of bad for the environment. Oh well.

name: a sandwich
desc: There's entirely too much mayo on it.

name: a shiny key
desc: It's... a key. I'm not sure what you expected from it. It is pretty shiny though.

name: a door
desc: It's locked. There's a keyhole, though.

name: a bathtub
desc: It's empty. It looks like it's been empty a long while.
